casebody.data:
No. 10-537. Osage Nation, Petitioner v. Constance Irby, Secretary-Member of the Oklahoma Tax Commission, et al. 562 U.S. 1214, 131 S. Ct. 1553,

179 L. Ed. 2d 296,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1354. February 22, 2011.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
